title: Need help regarding XP boost
body:
Hey guys, I was wondering if XP boosts can be changed to IP boosts. I bought a 50 win XP boost to get to level 30 (terrible decision) and I have a more than 25 wins left and I am already level 29. I wanted to submit a ticket, but the support page wouldn't let me sign in. Can any Riot employees  look into this situation?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Your best bet for this would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), I believe they should be able to help you out in this case.
Hey SephirothSG, every time I attempt to submit a ticket, the site asks me to sign in. That's fine but am unable to sign in which is why I posted this here.

Hey there,

Could you attempt to sign in from another browser, or through an "Incognito" tab in your current browser, let me know if this helps.
Update! So it worked in Mozilla without incognito. Thanks for the help SephirothSG!
It just reloads the page when I click sign in.
